name: Monster tears BTC
description: Hi! I'm mummy. How do you see me? Scary monster? Maybe the monster is in trouble too? Have you ever imagined that? Once you know that, you see! You won't look like a monster anymore. Imagine they feels. I am sure you can relate to some of them. It is created by Rio, a 9-year-old autistic child, and his mother. The theme of the work is diversity, based on the difficulty of living due to the characteristics of the disability.
